mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pay_num AS "payNum", a.out_trade_no AS "outTradeNo", a.pay_money AS "payMoney", a.original_amount as"originalAmount", a.cash_amount as "cashAmount", a.payer AS "payer", s.name AS "bizPayRecord.payer.name", a.cust_id AS "customer.id", so.name as "customer.name", so.phone as "customer.phone", a.biz_status AS "bizStatus", a.account AS "account", o.name AS "account.name", a.to_account AS "toAccount", f.name AS "toAccount.name", a.record_type AS "recordType", a.record_type_name AS "recordTypeName", a.pay_type AS "payType", a.pay_type_name AS "payTypeName", a.trade_reason AS "tradeReason", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", su.name as "createBy.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", us.name as "updateBy.name", a.update_time AS "updateDate", sua.mobile as "customer.moblieMoeny.mobile", sof.name as "custConsultant.centers.name"

left join sys_user su on a.create_id=su.id left join sys_user us on a.update_id=us.id LEFT JOIN sys_office so on so.id=a.cust_id LEFT JOIN sys_user s on s.id = a.payer LEFT JOIN sys_office o on o.id = a.account LEFT JOIN sys_office f on f.id = a.to_account LEFT join sys_user sua on sua.company_id=so.id and so.primary_person = sua.id
LEFT JOIN biz_custom_center_consultant bcc on bcc.cust_id=so.id LEFT JOIN sys_office sof ON sof.id = bcc.center_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO biz_pay_record( id,
pay_num,
out_trade_no,
pay_money,
original_amount,
cash_amount,
payer, cust_id, biz_status,
account,
to_account,
record_type, record_type_name, pay_type, pay_type_name,
trade_reason,
status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id},
#{payNum},
#{outTradeNo},
#{payMoney},
#{originalAmount},
#{cashAmount},
#{payer}, #{customer.id}, #{bizStatus},
#{account.id},
#{toAccount.id},
#{recordType}, #{recordTypeName}, #{payType}, #{payTypeName},
#{tradeReason},
#{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE biz_pay_record SET pay_num = #{payNum}, out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo},
pay_money = #{payMoney},
original_amount = #{original_amount},
cash_amount = #{cashAmount},
payer = #{payer}, cust_id = #{customer.id}, biz_status = #{bizStatus},
account = #{account},
to_account = #{toAccount}, > record_type = #{recordType}, record_type_name = #{recordTypeName}, pay_type = #{payType}, pay_type_name = #{payTypeName}, trade_reason = #{tradeReason}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
